data.title: Rockford General Store
data.text:
336-374-5317

Wed-Sat: 10:00-5:00 Sun: 12:00-5:00 | Mon: CLOSED Tues:CLOSED

Minutes away from Winston-Salem, Greensboro, Wilkesboro, Elkin, Pilot Mtn, Mt Airy and the Virginia State Line

Who says you can't go back in time?

Come to Rockford and we will prove that yes you can! The general store was the gathering place and the center of activity in days gone past and in Rockford it still is.

Come visit the best kept secret in North Carolina where âHello and how are you doing todayâ will greet you every time you walk through the door.

A true old fashioned country store. Grab yourself a Grape Nehi or an Orange Crush and have a seat on a bench on the front porch, or grab a rocking chair beside the wood stove and sit a spell.

Look what is going on now on Facebook â
